metadata.title: CVE-2023-52688 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:ath12k: fix the error handler of rfkill config When the core rfkill configthrows error, it should free the allocated resources. Currently it is notfreeing the core pdev create resources. Avoid this issue by calling thecore pdev destroy in the error handler of core rfkill config. Found thisissue in the code review and it is compile tested only.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
